thread.title: LDjan2017
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by LDjan2017

author: LDjan2017
title: LDjan2017
text: I returned the product I had bought. There was nothing wrong with it I just wasn't keen - the hazard of online shopping. Only gripe was that i had to ask for confirmation that return had been received, and to pay for the return postage, so I probably wouldn't order online again unless I knew I wouldn't need to return. Otherwise all great.
